price: 86. Zeg (o Mohammed): “Ik vraag hier geen loon voor van jullie, noch behoor ik tot de degenen die wat verzinnen.
arabic: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qul mā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wamā anā mina al-mutakalifīna
